name: Devesh Sonpure
headline: Consulting & Transformation Leader | Banking, Risk & Regulatory Transformation
about:
I am a consulting and transformation leader with 19+ years of experience delivering large-scale banking and regulatory change programs across India and global markets. My work has focused on risk and regulatory transformation, enterprise governance, data-led reporting modernization, and automation-driven productivity improvement.
I have led multi-country delivery teams, worked closely with senior stakeholders across risk, compliance, operations, and technology, and helped organizations move from fragmented, manual processes to structured and scalable operating models. My strength lies in breaking down complex regulatory or operational problems and driving execution through disciplined delivery.
